rukus.text: In (the story of) Joseph and his brothers there are definitely signs for those who ask
(Remember) when they said: Joseph and his brother (Benjamin) are more loved by our father than us, although we are a bunch, our father is certainly in an obvious mistake
Kill Joseph or throw him out to another land, then your fatherâ€™s full attention will be yours, and you will be righteous people after that
A speaker among them said: do not kill Joseph, but throw him down in the bottom of the well so some caravan picks him up if you are doers
They said: our father, why do you not trust us with Joseph while we really wish him well
Send him with us tomorrow to enjoy and play and we are certainly his guardians
He said: indeed it saddens me if you take him away, and I am afraid that a wolf eats him while you are unaware of him
They said: if a wolf eats him while we are a bunch, then indeed we are losers
And when they took him away and they all agreed to put him in the bottom of the well, We revealed to him: (some day) you shall inform them of this affair of theirs while they would not realize
And they came crying to their father in the evening
They said: father, we went racing and we left Joseph with our things then the wolf ate him, and you do not believe us even though we are truthful

And they brought his shirt with false blood on it. He said: no, but you let yourselves be seduced by a matter, so a nice patience (is necessary for me), and God is Whom to call for help about what you claim
And a caravan came, then they sent their water carrier, and he let down his bucket (into the well). He said: good news, this is a boy. And they hid him as merchandise while God knew what they do
And they sold him for a low price, a few coins, and they were indifferent about him
